A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love the Star Wars franchise. I have ever since I was a kid.  This movie had an interesting plot and was pretty good\, it just was missing something I can't put my finger on. To all of the hardcore Star Wars fans like me however\, you should definitely watch it because it's a nice addition to the series and it can't get any worse than the prequels. Hahaha
